name: Fifteen seconds (qtip)
description:
Fifteen seconds is an abstract platformer created in a 4-hour game development challenge.

Get to the end. Avoid the red squares.

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left/Right Joystick: Move the character
  • A Button: Jump
  • B Button: Dash

Keyboard Controls:

  • A/D, Left/Right: Move the character
  • Space: Jump
  • J: Dash
